data.name: Big Tic-Tac-Toe Solver
data.description:
Hello. Please solve my and my friends Tic Tac Toe game. We decided, for whatever reason, to PLAY WITH BIG BOARDS. But we're too lazy to work out who the winner is. We need someone to be judge. Can you write a program to do it? Either "X" will win, or "O", or it will be a "draw" so please return either 1 of these 3 options as the result. Expect board sizes upto 100 x 100.

Some examples: 
```
Input: 
[ [ 'O', 'O', 'X' ], 
  [ 'X', 'O', 'X' ], 
  [ 'O', 'X', 'O' ] ]
 
Output: 
"O"
```


```
Input: 
[ [ 'O', 'O', 'X', 'O' ],
  [ 'X', 'X', 'O', 'X' ],
  [ 'O', 'O', 'X', 'O' ],
  [ 'X', 'X', 'O', 'X' ] ]
 
Output: 
"draw"
```

```
Input:
[ [ 'X', 'X', 'O', 'X', 'O' ],
  [ 'O', 'X', 'X', 'O', 'O' ],
  [ 'O', 'O', 'X', 'X', 'O' ],
  [ 'O', 'X', 'X', 'X', 'O' ],
  [ 'O', 'O', 'O', 'X', 'X' ] ]
  
Output:
"X"
```
